Text: Your TD Waterhouse Application for Margin Short Selling and OptionsPST Dear Investor As a valued client of TD Waterhouse Investor Services you know we are committed to providing you with exceptional support and services as well as the opportunity to trade whenever you want however you want This is why we enable our clients to apply online to take advantage of the flexible accounts and services we offer including Margin accounts Short Selling and Options trading We are pleased to inform you that your application for a Margin account Short Selling and Options trading has been approved Benefit from our competitive rates of interest whenever you choose to trade on margin Simply continue using your TD Waterhouse account number and enjoy the support service and access we provide our clients Your account has been approved for Calls Puts and Covered Writing X Spreads X Uncovered Writing X If you require additional information please contact a TD Waterhouse Investment Representative by calling Thank you for investing with TD Waterhouse We look forward to helping you achieve your financial goals New Accounts Dept TD Waterhouse Investor Services Canada Inc TD Waterhouse is a subsidiary of TD Waterhouse Group Inc a subsidiary of TD Bank TD Waterhouse Member CIPF
